title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, March 16 , 2022
description: Today is the birthday of César Vallejo born in Peru, in 1892. A poet, he only published two books in his lifetime but was hailed as a revolutionary innovator of the form.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
